Director of Engineering: 16+ yrs | BSE/BS in Engineering | PayPal
August 12, 2012, Ibrahim worked with Bryant in the same group

I've known Ibrahim both as a peer and as a direct report.  Ibrahim's technical skills are strong, particularly in the areas of design and coding.  Despite these strengths, he is open to feedback on how to improve his implementations; this balance is what makes him a pleasure to work with.As a manager, Ibrahim has had direct impact in developing several of his reports to become better communicators and effective coders.  His sense of "doing the right thing" has instilled a standard within his team, and with his technical background, he leads with an understanding of the underlying issues.  A particular example is when he advised the team to consider Java for new components despite the team's reservations; the team now is comprised of many Java developers who now know how to take advantage of the language and tools to code more effectively!I would most certainly welcome an opportunity to work with Ibrahim in the future in either capacity.  His mix of honesty, communication, and technical ability is rare and uniquely brands him as an effective leader.

July 9, 2012, Qian reported directly to Ibrahim

It is an honor to recommend Ibrahim, as my manager and supervisor. His expertise in both technology and management makes him a great technologist and provides strong leadership in this field.    Before becoming a manager, he was one of our top engineers. This background empowered him with the vision to pioneer and support many technology initiatives in the Financial Product team. His strength of balancing business needs vs. pushing technology forward was substantial.    Ibrahim upholds values and ethics, carries a go getter attitude, and is open minded, weighs and chooses for the consideration of the vertical and the company as a whole. These traits had gained him high respect from the team and across the vertical. It is well known that he enables real success.    As a manager, he puts focus on the career growth of the team. Not just by providing opportunities, he also coaches, supports, listens. He emphasizes and believes in strong team building. His leadership style had significant contributions to the tight binding of the team.    In short, he gained my full trust and respect.
